name: Atlantis Tower Room
description: 375 square feet of marble-accented living space with majestic Sierra Nevada views through floor-to-ceiling windows. Voted Reno's Best Rooms, these non-smoking rooms feature custom Sealy pillow-top mattresses, 50-inch flat screen HDTV with 45+ HD channels, premium Wi-Fi, individual climate control, digital safe, and June Jacobs bath products. Choose from one king or two queen beds.
shortDescription: 375 sq ft marble-accented room with Sierra Nevada views and custom pillow-top beds.

meta.title: Atlantis Tower Room – Reno's Best Rooms | Golf The High Sierra
meta.description: Book the Atlantis Tower Room in Reno – 375 sq ft with Sierra Nevada views, marble accents, and custom pillow-top beds.
